casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Michael R. SOLOMON No. 47P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Michael R. Solomon, for Solomon, Michael R. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Michael D. Waters, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 31st of January 2019 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Warren County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
